name: svg-pen-sketch
description: An easy-to-use JavaScript library aimed at making it easier to draw on SVG elements when using a digital pen (such as the Surface Pen).

scripts.start: parcel watch src/index.js -o svg-pen-sketch --global SvgPenSketch --out-dir dist/ --public-url .
scripts.build: parcel build src/index.js -o svg-pen-sketch --global SvgPenSketch --out-dir dist/ --public-url .
scripts.prepare: parcel build src/index.js -o svg-pen-sketch --global SvgPenSketch --out-dir dist/ --public-url . --no-cache

author: desousak
